data.actual_result: The category name goes out of the box
data.expected_result: The category name is supposed to display correctly
data.short_description: Having a long named category and editing a channels permissions in it messes up the "Permissions synced with" box.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a long named category - Create a channel in it - Edit it's permissions - Observe the "Permissions synced with" box
